com.mapdigit.gis

Class MapLayerContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayer
      • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayerContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DigitalMap

    public abstract class MapLayerContainer
extends MapLayer
    MapLayerContainer is a collection of map layers.
    © Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
